formattedAddress: 9 Orchard St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 9 Orchard St, New York, NY 10002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Polished hotel offering chic rooms & suites in a converted 1912 bank, plus dining & a cocktail bar.

originalText.text:
Stayed at Nina Orchard for two weeks over Christmas and New Years, loved every minute. Front desk staff were lovely. Our best drinks were at The Swan Room.
Special thanks though to housekeeping staff, who were super attentive. Our room was immaculate to return to morning and night.

text.text:
Stayed at Nina Orchard for two weeks over Christmas and New Years, loved every minute. Front desk staff were lovely. Our best drinks were at The Swan Room.
Special thanks though to housekeeping staff, who were super attentive. Our room was immaculate to return to morning and night.

originalText.text:
Nine Orchard is not to be missed.  The service is extraordinary, we received such a warm welcome.  We had multiple delays in our flight into NY (summer storms) and arrived well past the midnight hour.  The front desk was so kind and helped us with our bags… I think they could tell we were exhausted.

Our room was stunning, the turn down service is exceptional… the cookies were such a surprise and quite possibly some of the best I have ever had.

The beds are divine… it was so comforting to be able to crawl into bed after such a long day and feel like you were being wrapped up in a nice warm hug.

We enjoyed our stay…. the staff is warm, welcoming, and cares about their guests.  The surrounding neighborhood had grit and so much character.  There are a ton of vintage shops, as well as wonderful restaurants.  The subway lines are close.

I would highly recommend nine orchard as your home base anytime you find yourself in the city.

originalText.text: My business stay at the Nine Orchard was fantastic! The quirky and cute room design added a unique touch to the experience. The staff was exceptional, and I thoroughly enjoyed the bar with its beautiful setting. Looking forward to coming back for another visit!

text.text: My business stay at the Nine Orchard was fantastic! The quirky and cute room design added a unique touch to the experience. The staff was exceptional, and I thoroughly enjoyed the bar with its beautiful setting. Looking forward to coming back for another visit!

originalText.text: Wow, What an amazing stay! My wife and I had fabulous staycation in Nine Orchard hotel. We really love the intimate feel of the hotel, the Corner Bar restaurant and the Swan room cocktail lounge. We liked it so much we had four meals in the hotel and the food was delicious, the servers are patient and friendly.  The atmosphere makes me want to move in permanently. Our room was great too. Really nice luxury touches from fabric and texture, lighting and controls, sound and in house playlist channels, and super comfy bed! I highly recommend it for business, pleasure and everything in between!

text.text: Wow, What an amazing stay! My wife and I had fabulous staycation in Nine Orchard hotel. originalText.text: My wife and I stayed at Nine Orchard with friends during fashion week to attend the US Open. Despite the business of the week, the staff attended to us like VIPs. The rooms were charming and fantastically appointed and I enjoyed that the cleaning staff smiled, and gave me chocolate chip cookies!
